pothupitiye diksan piyadasasathapena buddha prathimawarankoth wiharaye dasunakparani bithu sithuwamakshatha was satharakata wadi kalak sudu misaditu ayomaya grahanayen miriki oddal wuna manasikathwayen siri lak dana wesesinma sihala bodunuwan nidahas karawa ganu pinisa suwisheshi wuth dushkarawuth yuga mehewaraka niyali janathawage janma bhumiya wu panaduraye rankoth wiharaya yuga mehewaraka thothannaki.kri.wa.1890 ta perathuwa gal kande wiharaya saha gal wale wiharaya yana nam walin handinwuna mema punyasthanaye upatha asirimath ya.
